inn1.comm: good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of away swing and Trescothick leaves it through to the keeper

another line and length delivery outside the off stump, bit more closer to the off stump line on this occasion, Trescothick is tempted to have a poke at it and the ball zips past the outside edge, well bowled Vaas
another good length delivery, Vaas right on the money straightaway, Trescothick watchfully leaves it through to the keeper
and again, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away late, Trescothick sizes it up nicely and plays inside the line
another typical Vaas delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away, Trescothick plays safe and the ball thuds into the keeper's gloves

beaten! once again Vaas hits the coin outside the off stump and the ball shapes away from the left-hander, Trescothick is made to play at it and for the second time in this over the ball rips past the outside edge, Vaas starts off with a terrific over
starts off with a wide down the leg side, first run on the board for England
short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and slanting away from the left-hander, the angle creats the width and Cook leaves it through to the keeper
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, pacey delivery, Cook stands tall on the back-foot and defends it down on the leg side
again slightly short and drifting onto middle and leg, Cook fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad
on the middle and off stump line, coming in with the arm, Cook on the front-foot defending
bit of width offered outside the off stump but not enough for the batsman to free his arms, Cook gets behind the line and taps it away towards cover
Malinga once again keeps it on the middle and off stump line, Cook on the back-foot defending, Malinga too starts off with a decent over

Vaas continues to impress! good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away, Trescothick comes down the track in an attempt to negate the swing but fails miserably, luckily for him the ball moves away just enough to beat the outside edge
once again Trescothick comes down the track but this time leaves the ball through to the keeper
another probing delivery outside the off stump, Tresothick is done travelling, this time he stays back in his crease and strokes it away towards cover
another excellent delivery from the veteran, Vaas getting good purchase out of this track, Trescothick safely leaves it for the keeper
slightly short and close to the off stump line, Trescothick looking to defend it on the back-foot gets nowhere near the ball, still no runs off the bat!
back-toback maidens! line and length delivery and once again Trescothick is beaten on the prod, another fantastic over from Vaas comes to an end, England struggling a bit here
short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump line, Cook on the front-foot driving and the ball rolls away off the inside edge to fine leg region, finally they manage a run of the bat
turned away off the pads to the square leg region
again on the middle and leg stump line, Trescothick finds the fielder at square leg
punched off the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards cover point, Tharanga moves across quickly and negates the chance of a single
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towardsa mid-on
forced away off the back-foot to the mid-off region

short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and shaping away, the line and length is just perfect and Cook had no option but to play at it, once again the away swing takes the ball past the outside edge
chips down the track and defends it down to mid-on, well played in the end
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Cook stays back and flicks it away straight to the fielder at midwicket
drifting down the leg side, a rare bad delivery from Vaas, Cook shuffles across a bit, gets well inside the line and clips it down to fine leg for an easy single
defended outside the off stump
short and wide outside the off stump and Trescothick opens his account with a stunning drive through cover point
swing and miss outside the off stump, lazy looking shot
Malinga drifts onto middle and leg, Cook goes right back and clips it away through square leg
short of a good length delivery, Cook on the back-foot driving, nice looking shot but he fails to get it past the fielder at point
worked away on the leg side
punched away off the back-foot to the point region, excellent diving stop from Dilshan there cuts off a certain boundary

more run, England on the move now - short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, bit of width offered and Trescothick drives it away right into the gap between mid-off and cover, excellent placement
good length delivery outside the off stump, Cook comes down the track and gets beaten by a long way, not the first time this has happened
Sangakkara standing up to the stumps now - bit of width offered outside the off stump, cut away straight to the fielder at backward point
good length delivery, close to the off stump line and Cook square drives it point, no room for a single there
worked away off the stumps to the midwicket region, early call and the batsmen scamper through for a single

slightly short and close to the off stump line, Trescothick leans back, makes room and drills it through cover point for his second boundary of the innings, sweetly timed and the placement was just perfect, a typical Trescothick shot - it's a no-ball as well
worked away on the leg side for an easy single
close to the off stump line and Cook is beaten outside the off stump, Sangakkara standing up to the stumps fails to collect it cleanly
short of a good length delivery, slanting across the left-hander, Tresco stands tall on the back-foot and punches it away towards cover

fuller length delivery outside the off stump, not in the slot though, Trescothick chips back and drives hard, nicely opening the face of the bat at the point of impact and the ball rockets away to the point fence, that's more like the Trescothick we know
four more! short delivery down the leg side, Trescothick lines it up well, quickly gets into a good position and pulls it down to the fine leg fence, bad ball put away in style
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, much better line from Malinga, Trescothick watchfully drives it away towards short cover
worked away off the back-foot to the fine leg region
close to the off stump line and shaping away late, Trescothick on the back-foot defending and the ball zips past the outside edge
good length delivery outside the off stump, again hint of away swing, Trescothick gets behind the line and stokes it away towards cover point, carefully played
drifting onto middle and leg, Trescothick looking to work it away through square leg fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad, missed out on some easy runs there
good length delivery outside the off stump and Trescothick drives it away towards cover

once again drifting down the leg side and this time Trescothick takes full toll, turned away with a hint of artistry and the ball races away to the vacant fine leg fence, England back on track after shaky start

good length delivery outside the off stump, hint of swing but Trescothick had it covered, another positive looking drive and the ball goes past Kapugedera at extra cover, that should have been stopped
worked away through midwicket for a brace
punched away towards cover
on the pads and Cook too nicely works it away through midwicket
defended outside the off stump
in the channel outside the off stump and Trescothick strokes it away towards cover
short of a good length delivery, again on the middle and off stump line, Trescothick stands tall on the back-foot and taps it straight to the fielder at short cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, Cook waits for the ball and drives it away well wide of the fielder at gully
in the channel outside the off stump, driven away towards extra cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, this one kicked-up after hitting the deck and Trescothick is beaten by the extra bounce, good take by the keeper
again no room offered but this time Trescothick opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man for a single, sensible cricket
forced away off the back-foot to the cover region
punched wide of the fielder at mid-off, quick single added to the total

short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Cook punches it away towards extra cover, Trescothick takes off for a single but Cook is not interested, Tharanga moving in from the edge of the circle had just the one stump to aim at and he missed the target by a long way, direct hit and Trescothick would have been history
driven away towards mid-off
driven away towards point, Dilshan fails to stop it cleanly and they scamper through for a single
defended down on the off side
short ball and Trescothick defends it on the back-foot but not cleanly, ball rolls away behind the stumps on the leg side and they steal a single
on the stumps, driven to mid-off
steered down to third man for an easy single
beaten outside the off stump

good length delivery outside the off stump, Cook stands his ground and drives hard, eyeing the cover region, ball clips the outside edge and races away to third man, Jayasuriya hurtles across in the deep and keeps it down to just a single
driven away well in front of point, no room for a single there
driven straight back along the carpet to the mid-off region
beaten outside the off stump, Cook went at it with an angled bat
harmless delivery outside the off stump, driven wide of the cover fielder for an easy single
starts off with a short and wide delivery outside the off stump, Cook leans back and chops it away to the backward point fence - easy runs

another short delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and coming in with the angle, Cook once again gets into a good position and pulls it away through midwicket, diving stop by Maharoof in the deep saves two runs - Fernando under pressure here
better line and length from Fernando, Cook watchfully drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off
worked away off the pads to the midwicket region

fuller length delivery outside the off stump, not quite in the slot but Trescothick goes after it, luckily for him the ball clips the outside edge and races away to the third man fence, this is turning out to be  a good over for England

short of a good length delivery, this one nipped back in sharply and Trescothick is beaten comprehensively, not sure if the ball kissed the inside edge, Lankans were confident but umpire Doctrove was not convinced
shot! good length delivery outside the off stump, driven right into the gap between cover and point, try stopping that
under pressure Vaas fires it on the middle and leg stump line, Cook lines it up well and punch-drives past the fielder at mid-on
worked away through midwicket
again nicely worked away through midwicket for a brace, played off the front-foot on this occasion
driven away towards extra cover
edged away to third man for an easy singe, another big over for England comes to an end, 13 coming off it
fuller length ball on the middle and leg stump line, Cook drives straght down the gorund to long-on fence, runs flowing here for England!
short ball outside off stump, Cook looks to pull but does not tme it well, ball rolls to mid-wicket
driven on the front-foot to extra-cover
good length ball just outside off stump, batsman drives through covers for a couple of runs
half-volley outside off stump, driven hard but straight to the extra-cover fielder
short of length ball on the off stump, punched away on the back-foot to mid-on
short of length ball outside off stump, nipping away, batsman tries to drive off the back-foot but gets beaten
on the pads, Trescothick tries to flick but gets on the pads
good length ball on the off stump, Cook drives it away to mid-on
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven on the front-foot to extra-cover and take a quick single
short of length on the stumps, turned away through mid-wicket for an easy single

Breakthrough from Maharoof! good length ball just outside off stump, nipping away, Cook moves forward and tries to hit it over cover fielder but ends up giving a catch practice to Jayawardene at extra-cover
short ball outside off stump, Trescothick tries to cut and mistimes, ball rolls to cover point and they take a quick single
defended on the front-foot to offside
good length ball outside off stump, nipping in, Bell drives but gets the inside half of the bat to cover
short and wide outside off stump, cut away to thirdman and Bell off the mark
defended on the back-foot to point, Trescothick looks for a single but Bell sends him back
short ball outside off stump, coming in with the angle, Trescothick cuts it away to thirdman and keeps the strike
defened on the back-foot down the wicket
half-volley on the off stump, Trescothick puts it away through extra-covers, excellent placement and ball races away to the fence
Four more! short of length ball around the off stump, Trescothick makes room and taps it away behind point, superb timing in that shot and ball reaches the backward point fence
defended with an angled bat to short thirdman
good length ball outside off stump, glided away to third man
good length ball on the stumps, pushed away on the front-foot to mid-off and an easy single taken, 11 runs off the over!
short ball coming in with the angle, Trescothick drops it down on the offside and batsmen scamper through a single, Trescothick reaches his fifty!
glided away on the back-foot to thirdman
short ball around the off stump, Trescothick goes for the pull but gets on top of the bat, rolls down to Jayasuriya at mid-on
defended on the back-foot to point
fuller length ball on the off stump, Trescothick lofts it straight over the bowlers head, good shot!
Four more! this time to the long-on fence, good length ball on the middle and off stump, coming in, Trescothick lofts it with the swing over mid-on fielder
pushed on the front-foot to mid-on and the final powerplay comes to an end
good length ball on the off stump, Bell defends it away on the front-foot to onside
back of length on the off stump, pushed straight to point fielder
fuller length ball on the off stump, Bell drives it on the front-foot wide of the mid-off fielder, good placement!
length ball outside off stump, glided away to thirdman
yorker length ball outside off stump, Trescothick pushes to short extra-cover, Bell backs up too far and Kapugedera has a shy at the bowlers end, misses the run-out chance and they take an overthrow
defended on the front-foot to onside
flighted and fuller length ball outside off stump, Trescothick drives it away to extra-cover fence, good placement and a good start for the over
fraction short outside off stump, cut away wide of the sweeper cover fielder for a couple of runs
flat one around the off stump, Trescothick looks to cut it again but is beaten by the pace
defended on the front-foot to offside, Dilshan starting to get it right
fraction short outside off stump, Trescothick cuts and misses it again
good length ball just outside off stump, turning away, Trescothick pushes on the front-foot and gets beaten, big appeal but Doctrove declines
defended on the back-foot to point
short of length ball outside off stump, glided away to thirdman
good length ball on the off stump, nipping in, Bell pushes it away to mid-wicket
fraction short outside off stump, Bell moves back and steers it away to thirdman
on the pads, flicked away to deep mid-wicket and they pick 4 runs off the over
fraction short outside off stump, Trescothick cuts it away behind point for a couple of runs
good length ball around the off stump, Trescothick smashes on the front-foot through the covers, no chance for the fielder at deep cover, excellent shot!
fuller length ball on the pads, flicked away to deep mid-wicket
flighted and full on the off stump, driven on the front-foot to long-off
fuller length ball again from Dilshan, driven wide of the long-off fielder, Fernando does well to stop a couple of runs
flat on the off stump, batsman steps out and defends it back to the bowler
driven on the front-foot but good fielding from Dilshan saves runs
length ball on the off stump, nipping away, glided away to thirdman
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven on the front-foot wide of the deep cover fielder
slower one on the off stump, defended on the back-foot
short ball outside off stump, Bell fails to put it away for runs, cuts it straight to Dilshan at point
fraction short on the leg stump, pushed on the back-foot down the wicket
flighted ball on the off stump, turning away, Trescothick moves forward and glides it down at the last minute to thirdman fence, very well executed from the opener!
down the legside, batsman tries to sweep but fails to connect, Sangakkara misses as well and ball runs away to the fence
defended on the front-foot to cover point
driven on the front-foot to deep cover
flighted ball, batsman uses his feet and drives to long-on
fraction short, Bell tries to flick but gets the leading edge along the ground to cover point, good over for England!
defended on the front-foot
tossed up, Bell comes down the track and drives to long-on
short ball outside off stump, Trescothick punches on the back-foot to extra-cover fence
flat around the off stump, defended on the front-foot
driven on the front-foot to long-off
length ball on the off stump, reverse swept to short thirdman
starts with a slower one, defended on the front-foot to point

Gone! one more slower delivery, this time too short, Bell picks it up and tries to steer to thirdman, takes the outside edge to second slip region, Sangakkara moves and dives in full length and takes a one-handed catch towards his right
short ball outside off stump, Strauss pulls and gets an inside edge to short-fine leg
left alone outside off stump
defended on the back-foot to offside
another slower delivery, Trescothick tries to steer and gets the outside edge, Sangakkara dives to his left and fails to latch onto it
flighted ball outside off stump, Trescothick uses his feet and drives to long-off
good length ball on the stumps, defended on the front-foot to mid-wicket
length ball on the middle and leg stump line, turned away to mid-wicket, good fielding from Dilshan saves a single
fuller length ball on the leg stump, driven to long-on
driven on the front-foot to long-off and moves into 90's
fraction short and turning in, Strauss moves across and works it away towards square leg for an easy single
short ball outside off stump, Strauss steers it away to thirdman
short ball outside off stump, coming in nicely with the angle, Trescothick defends it away to offside
short ball outside off stump, Trescothick defends it away to point and looks for a  single but Dilshan quick to the ball
punched away on the back-foot to deep cover
short ball outside off stump, Strauss mistimes his pull shot and ball rolls down to mid-on
short of length ball on the stumps, defended on the back-foot to short mid-wicket
fuller length ball around the off stump, driven wide of the deep cover fielder for a couple of runs
short ball on the off stump, this time Strauss gets it right, pulls it away nicely along the ground but straight to deep square leg fielder
fuller length ball on the leg stump, driven to long-on
turned away straight to Jayasuriya at short-fine leg
on the leg stump, Trescothick sweeps it away to deep square leg
driven on the front-foot to long-off
pushed into cover point and they take an easy single
flighted ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
short of length ball outside off stump, defended on the back-foot to point
good length ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot to onside
short ball on the leg stump, glanced away nicely to fine leg
fuller length ball on the off stump, Trescothick drives it away to long-off and moves onto 95
half-volley outside off stump, Strauss moves forward and drives to the cover region, one more misfield at covers and they take 3 runs
defended on the back-foot to onside
flighted ball outside off stump, driven on the front-foot straight to the cover fielder
down the legside, batsman misses the sweep, Sangakkara fails to collect it cleanly and they take a run
flighted ball on the off stump, Trescothick steps out and lofts it straight and wide of the long-off fielder, Maharoof moves across from long-off but difficult to stop the ball
driven to long-off and Trescothick reaches his 12th century in ODI's
turned away to mid-wicket fielder
pushed back to the bowler
on the pads, Trescothick tries to flick but misses, ball clips the pads and runs away to the fine leg fence
fraction short on the off stump, nipping away, batsman steers away to thirdman
on the pads again, Strauss glances away fine and puts it away to the fence, bad bowling from Maharoof!
short of length ball on the off stump, glided away to thirdman
one more run down to the thirdman region
slower one around the off stump, driven on the front-foot to long-off
tossed up on the leg stump, Strauss comes down the track and drives to long-on
length ball on the stumps, Trescothick steps out and lofts it away over mid-wicket for a couple of runs, good chip shot!
fraction short outside off stump, cut away to deep point for a couple of runs
Max! flighted ball on the stumps, Trescothick charges down the track and lofts it superbly high and over long-on fence, 1st six of the innings!
punched on the back-foot to long-on
turned away on the back-foot to deep mid-wicket, 13 runs of the over
length ball on the off stump, driven to deep cover
good length ball outside off stump, driven on the up but straight to the cover fielder
length ball outside off stump, given width, Strauss square drives it away to thrdman
short of length ball on the off stump, punched to long-off
way outside off stump, left alone
short ball outside off stump, Trescothick smashes it away to deep cover fielder
pushed on the front-foot to cover
flighted and full on the off stump, driven to long-on
short and wide outside off stump, Strauss tries to cut and fails to connect it
fuller length ball, driven on the front-foot to long-on
flighted ball on the stumps, Trescothick lofts it away over bowlers head for a couple of runs
fuller length ball, driven to long-on and they take 5 runs of the over
good length ball on the off stump, driven on the up to deep cover fielder

Malinga strikes! good length ball on the off stump, nipping away off the wicket, Strauss looks to drive through offside, not much of footwork from the skipper, ball takes the outside edge and straight to Sangakkara
short of length ball around the off stump, defended on the back-foot to offside
good length ball outside off stump, given width to free his arms, Solanki square drives wide of the thirdman fielder
good length ball around the off stump, Solanki defends on the front-foot to offside
yorker on the stumps, hint of reverse inswing, Solanki gets his bat down in time and defends back to the bowler
driven on the front-foot to long-on
fuller length ball outside leg stump, Solanki sweeps and gets an under edge, ball rolls away fine to the fence
turned away on the front-foot through mid-wicket
Jayasuriya strikes! good length ball just outside off stump, turning in a bit, Trescothick moves back and tries to cut late but misses and the ball hits the off stump, end of an excellent innings!
on the pads, worked away to onside
fuller on the leg stump, flicked away to fine leg
fraction short on the stumps, worked away through mid-wicket for a couple of runs
short ball outside off stump, turning away, Solanki rocks back and cuts it away to deep point fence, good placement!
again a short one, turned away to mid-wicket
driven wide of the cover fielder
full and on the stumps, defended stretching well forward, ball rolls back to the bowler
quicker delivery, forced away towards cover
driven down to long-on, easy single
again on the middle and leg stump line and Dalrymple drives it down to long-on, off the mark finally
and again, driven down to long-on for a single
defended outside the off stump
drifting down the leg side, swept away just wide of the fielder at short fine leg, quick single taken
tossed up outside the off stump, driven well in front of point, again just a single
well flighted delivery on the pads, driven wide of the fielder at mid-on
slightly short and bit of width offered outside the off stump, too easy a delivery, Dalrymple rocks back and cuts it away behind point, Maharoof ends up escorting the ball to the fence
driven back to the bowler
fuller in length and Dalrymple punch-drives it straight back past the bowler
on the middle and leg stump line, bowled from round the stumps and sliding down the leg side, Dalrymple goes for the reverse sweep but fails to make contact, loud appeal for lbw turned down
good length delivery, driven wide of the cover fielder
fulltoss, was there to be hit but Sloanki finds the fielder at long-off
another harmless delivery and Dalrymple hammers it down to long-off, Chamara there fails to stop it cleanly and the ball rolls over the ropes, was a lazy attempt
once again Dalrymple fails to connect going for the reverse sweep, ball clips the pad and rolls away behind point
tossed up outside the off stump, Solanki comes down the track and drives it uplishly past the bowler
short of a good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and cutting in, Solanki stays back and defends it away towards cover point for a single
on the middle and leg stump line, Dalrymple gets behind the line and punches it down to mid-on for a single
good length delivery outside the off stump, tad quicker than the previous two deliveries, Solanki makes room and chops it down to third man, again just a single
forced away towards point, this is good cricket from Dalrymple
another single added to the total, again Solanki gets it through to his favourite long-on region
slightly short and Dalrymple jabs it down to long-on, awkward looking shot
swung away with the turn to the fine leg region
diven away through cover point, nicely opened the face of the bat to get the placement right, Malinga hurtles across in the deep and cuts off the boundary

about time! flat delivery on the middle and off stump line, Solanki comes down the track to the pick of the delivery and lofts it over the midwicket fence, there was protection in the deep but placed it to perfection
expected quicker delivery and Solanki was waiting for it, well played premeditated reverse sweep and the ball rockets away to the third man fence, shot!
driven wide of the cover fielder, easy single
again forced away towards towards extra cover, Dilshan scores a direct hit at the bowler's end but Solanki was never in trouble
fuller length delivery, driven down to long-on
low fulltoss on the stumps, probably the yorker gone wrong, Dalrymple jabs it past the fielder at midwicket, two more added to the total
good length delivery on the stumps, Dalrymple swings across the line and gets it on the middle of the bat, ball rockets away to deep midwicket and a diving effort in the deep ends in vain
bit of width offered outside the off stump and Dalrymple slices it past the fielder at backward point, bit of edge involved and the fielder in the deep had no chance of cutting it off
punched down to long-on, takes the first run quickly and comfortably comes back for the second
again driven down to long-on, Dilshan in the deep fails to pick it up cleanly and once again Solanki makes it across comfortably, end of a massive over for England
swing and a miss, bit of reverse swing, ball beats the inside edge and goes through to the keeper
fuller length delivery, probably the yorker gone wrong, punched down to long-on for a single

gets it right this time! perfect yorker on the stumps, Dalrymple fails to pick it up and he ends up playing down the wrong line, the ball hits the boot plumb in front of the stumps. Dead as a stone and up goes the finger, England five down
drifting down the leg side, Jones fails to make contact, ball clips the pad and rolls away towards cover, wild throw from Jayawardene and the batsmen scamper back for the second
worked away towards midwicket
slightly short, Solanki goes for the cut, ball clips the inside edge and rolls down to short fine leg, end of a good over from Malinga
good length delivery outside the off stump, bit of extra bounce and Maharoof is beaten outside the off stump
and again, kicked off a good length and Solanki is beaten outside the off stump, Sangakkara standing up to the stumps collects it cleanly
short ball, Solanki rocks back and pulls hard, ball clips the top edge and balloons up towards midwicket, Fernando hurtles across from mid-on but fails to hold on to a fairly hard chance
beaten outside the off stump, loud appeal for caught behind turned down, looked like a faint edge but umpire Doctrove was not impressed
cut away behind point for a single
driven down to long-off
way down the leg side and that's rightly called a wide

flat and quick, typical Malinga delivery, Jones comes down the track and gets hit on the pad, loud appeal and umpire Benson adjudicates in favour of the bowler, Jones was looking to get outside the line and clip it away towards fine leg but was done in by the extra pace of Malinga
beaten outside the off stump
yorker length delivery, Bresnan gets bat on ball and the ball races away past the leg stump

fuller length delivery on the stumps, cutting in with the arm, ball stopped a bit after hitting the deck, Bresnan too departs looking to clip it away towards fine leg, missed the target by miles and the ball crashed into middle and leg, fast and straight - Malinga at his best
punched down to long-on
driven down to long-off
defended down on the leg side, quick single and Solanki will keep the strike
stroked away well wide of the fielder at cover, just a single
lofted down to wide long-on, runs hard and comfortably comes back for the second
swung away to deep midwicket, two more added to the total
fuller length delivery, good straight delivery from Maharoof, Plunkett makes room but only manages to jab it down to mid-on for a single
good length delivery, close to the off stump line, Solanki makes room and drills it through the gap between the cover fielders, there is protection in the deep and they settle for a single
good length delivery, Plunkett backs away towards the leg side and strokes it behind point, single to end the innings

inn2.comm: starts off with a short of a good length delivery, Tharanga stays back and drives it away towards point, diving stop there saves runs, Sri Lanka are away&
fuller length delivery, drifting down the leg side, Jayasuriya fails to make contact but the ball clips the pad and races away past the diving keeper
another bad delivery from Ali, fuller in length and drifting onto the pads, Jayasuriya quickly gets into a good position and flicks it away to the backward square leg fence, excellent wristy shot
pitched up wide outside the off stump, Jayasuriya throws his bat at it, ball clips the inside edge onto the ground and lobs down to third man, Sri Lanka off to a good start here
beaten outside the off stump
on the stumps, cutting in, Tharanga defends it back to the bowler, Kabir Ali starts off with an expensive over
short and wide outside the off stump, too easy a delivery, massive chop and the ball rockets away to the cover fence
punched away towards cover

four more! slightly short and wide outside the off stump, another bad delivery, point, mid-off, two men at covers but Jayasuriya finds the gap beautifully, he is onto to something here, that's for sure!
under pressure Bresnan once again drags it short and wide outside the off stump, Jayasuriya waves it away as if it was a fly, didn't even bother to keep it down
way down the leg side, safe delivery
oh dear! another short and wide delivery outside the off stump, Jayasuriya stands tall on the back-foot and murders it through cover point, try stopping that
defended outside the off stump, ball rolls away on the off side and they steal a single
fulltoss, bit of a surprise delivery, Jayasuriya finds the man at mid-off

fuller in length and slightly wide outside the off stump, Jayasuriya lines it up quickly and lofts it over the cover fence for the first six of the innings, nicely opened the face of the bat at the point of impact to keep it square, it's a no-ball as well  - England under pressure here
driven down to third man for a single
defended outside the off stump
Tharanga too joins the party! good length delivery outside the off stump, not special there, stunning cover drive, a trademark Tharanga shot and the ball screams away to the cover fence

four more! another good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga pushes forward, gets closer to the line and drills it through the gap between cover and mid-off, sweetly timed and the he found the gap to perfection, Sri Lankan off to a flyer here
another no-ball, punched wide of the fielder at cover
beaten outside the off stump, there is a bowler at the other end
on the pads, Tharanga fails to make contact and the ball hits him on the thigh pad
defended outside the off stump
good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga pushes forward and hits through the line, ball flies away to the cover fence and that brings up the Sri Lankan fifty, would you believe it!
Plunkett once again strays onto the pad and this time Tharanga clips it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
short and wide outside the off stump, bowled from round the stumps, Tharanga stretches out and cuts it away in the air to deep backward point for a brace
drifting onto middle and leg, turned away off the back-foot to the fine leg region
driven away behind point
beaten outside the off stump, finally we have some cricket on here
good length delivery outside the off stump, was the slower delivery, Tharanga picks it up early and defends it down on the off side
left alone outside the off stump, Harmison starts off with a decent over
short of a good length delivery, bowled from round the stumps and drifting down the leg side, Jayasuriya leaves it through to the keeper
driven away towards cover, straight to the fielder

short and wide outside the off stump, Jayasuriya throws the kitchen sink at it and the ball flies off the outside edge, Dalrymple at gully time his jump well and gets a touch on it but fails to hold on to a fairly hard chance, that ball was travelling, would have been nothing less than a miracle, had he managed to pouch it
short and wide outside the off stump, this is horrible bowling from Plunkett, another massive slice and the ball rockets away to the backward point fence
forced away towards cover
good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga comes down the track and has a swing at it, ball clips the inside edge and races away to the fine leg fence
and the carnage continues! pitched up outside the off stump, Tharanga steps forward to the pitch of the delivery and hammers it over the extra cover fence, another clean hit
short rising delivery outside the off stump, Jayasuriya leaves it through to the keeper
punched away straight to the fielder at mid-off
forced away behind point
good length delivery, hint of swing and Tharanga is beaten outside the off stump
another tight delivery from the big man, defended on the back-foot

short rising delivery, pitched outside the off stump and coming in with the angle, Tharanga looking to duck under it gets hit on the helmet and the ball flies over slip cordon, nothing going England's way at the moment

and it gets worse! slower delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Tharanga picks it up early, shuffles across nicely and whips it away to the backward square leg fence, it's raining boundaries at the moment
defended outside the off stump, watchfully played
comes down the track and drives it wide of the fielder at midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, Jayasuriya goes for the sweep and gets it on the middle, ball races away to the backward square leg fence, Plunkett had a chance of stopping it but he failed miserably
and the saga continues! another good looking short, this time Jayasuriya gets it going fine and Plunkett is reduced to just a spectator
pushed back to the bowler
flatter trajectory but bit short, Jayasuriya quickly picks up the length, rocks back and pulls it away through midwicket for the third boundary of the over
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Tharanga drives and drives well, right into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
goes for the cut and gets beaten outside the off stump
bouncer on the stumps, Tharanga ducks under it
hit on the pads, ball was drifting down the leg side, Tharanga misses out there
short and wide outside the off stump, haven't they seen enough?! another perfect cut and the ball flies away to the point fence
beaten outside the off stump
fifty! Ali starts off with a dreadful ball, pitched up on the pads and Jayasuriya effortlessly flicks it away to the midwicket fence, one bounce and over the rope she goes
fulltoss , yorker gone worng and Jayasuriya whips it away through square leg
this is turning into a day-light massacre ! short and wide outside the off stump, Ali has lost it completely, murdered to the point fence - this is attacking cricket at its supreme best
again bit of width offered outside the off stump and Jayasuriya flays it over the cover fence, it's a no-ball as well so seven more added to the total. At this rate this won't last long
good length delivery outside the off stump, bit of sympathy creeps in and Jayasuriya strokes it away wide of the fielder at extra cover
punched wide of the fielder at cover, easy single
beaten outside the off stump

short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga goes for the cut, ball clips the outside edge and flies down to the third man fence, the ball was in the air for a long time and that kept the fielder interested but in the end it was not even a half chance
driven wide of the fielder at mid-on
wayward delivery down the leg side
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region
another horrible wide down the leg side
cut away towards point, Dalrymple fails to stop it cleanly and the batsmen scamper through for the second run
decent delivery outside the off stump, now that's a rarity, Jayasuriya leaves it through the keeper
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region
again Harmison drifts onto the pads and Tharanga tucks it away behind square for an easy single

good length delivery outside the off stump, inside edge produced and the ball rolls away behind the stumps on the leg side, Jones moves across in a flash and scores a direct hit at the striker's end but Jayasuriya was never in trouble
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Jayasuriya comes down the track and chips drives it over the bowler's heard to the long-off region, bit of edge involved
driven away straight to the fielder at cover
mis-timed pull and the ball balloons up behind square on the leg side but falls safely in the deep, that's the closest England have come to picking up a wicket
turned away towards midwicket
called for overstepping, driven wide off the cover fielder for an easy single
fuller length delivery outside the off stump, driven down to long-off for an easy single, this is excellent cricket from Sri Lanka
good length delivery on the pads, Tharanga stays back and nudges it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
in the channel outside the off stump, Tharanga gets behind the line and strokes it away towards extra cover, quick single called for and a wild throw from Plunkett gives away an extra run
driven off the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards gully
bouncer down the leg side and Tharanga ducks under it
nudged away towards midwicket
good length delivery, pitched close to the off stump line and this one nipped back in a touch, Jayasuriya pushes forward and watchfully defends it down on the off side
again defended outside the off stump
on the stumps, swept away to fine leg for a single
forced away towards cover, fielders are deep and they steal a single
tossed up outside the off stump, driven with the turn to the mid-off region
goes for the sweep and gets hit on the pad
slightly short and turning across, Jayasuriya stays back and at the last possible moment punches it away towards cover point
quicker delivery to end the over, worked away towards midwicket, no room for a single there, now it is starting to look more like a cricket match but one feels that the damage has been already done
off the pads to short fine leg
good length delivery outside the off stump, Tharanga stays back and punches it away through point, walking single added to the total
slightly short and slanting across the left-hander, Jayasuriya waits for the ball and taps it down to third man for a brace
defended with soft hands and the ball rolls down to mid-off, early call and a quick single is added to the total
forced away towards point
turned away off the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards midwicket, easy single to end the over
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven away to cover
swept away straight to short-fine leg
fraction short and turning away, punched away to sweeper cover
flighted and full ball on the off stump, driven hard to long-off
outside leg stump, Jayasuriya sweeps it hard to fine leg, Plunkett brings off an excellent stop to save a certain boundary
short ball outside leg stump, Tharanga pulls and ball clips the thigh pads on the way to keeper, appeal but Doctrove was right
driven on the front-foot to sweeper cover
short of length ball outside off stump, Jayasuiriya mistimes the cut but anyway gets a single at thirdman
fraction short and angled away outside off stump, Tharanga cuts it beautifully to backward point fence, excellent timing in that shot and ball races away to the fence
short on the legs, glanced away to deep square leg
flighted ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot to point region
good length ball, pushed on the front-foot to cover
nicely tossed up, driven to deep cover
flighted ball just outside off stump, Jayasuriya goes for a big sweep and misses it, nicely bowled by Dalrymple
flat on trajectory, defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
pushed on the front-foot through cover point, easy single taken
good length ball on the off stump, defended away to cover
length ball but this time given width outside off stump, Jayasuriya smashes uppishly through a ring of fielders on the offside
short ball on the leg stump, off the pads to fine leg
bouncer on the stumps, Tharanga ducks underneath
a rare play and a miss! length ball around the off stump, nipping away, Tharanga looks to drive on the up and gets beaten
yorker length ball just outside off stump, pushed to point
Four more to end the over! length ball outside off stump, Tharanga slashes on the front-foot over the point fielder
defended on the front-foot
outside leg stump, Jayasuriya sweeps and gets it fine for a couple of runs
defended on the front-foot to offside
flighted ball on the stumps, swept away to deep square leg
swept away again to deep square leg
defended on the front-foot to mid-off
fuller length ball outside off stump, pushed away to deep cover
good length ball outside off stump, driven away to sweeper cover
on the pads, Jayasuriya tries to work it away onside and gets on the pads
short of length ball around the off stump, punched through covers and an easy single taken
fraction short on the off stump, pushed through cover point
fuller length ball on the off stump, pushed away straight to cover&
fuller length ball on the off stump, driven to long-off
flighted and full ball around the off stump, driven to deep cover
defended on the front-foot to short mid-wicket
good length ball on the off stump, turning away, defended to short cover
length ball outside off stump, square driven to deep cover, just 3 overs off the over
short ball outside off stump, glided away to thirdman
fuller length ball outside off stump, Jayasuriya hits it away along the ground to long-on fence, cross-batted shot!
length ball on the off stump, Jayasuriya swings across the line and gets wrapped on the pads, loud appeal but Doctrove unconvinced, was a close call!
pushed through cover point and an easy single taken
short ball banged in on the stumps, Tharanga picks the length quickly, rocks back and pulls handsomely behind square
Four more and moves into the 90's! good length ball outside off stump, Tharanga just stands there and slashes away over the point fielder
length ball on the off stump, defended on the front-foot to mid-off and picks an easy single to reach his 21st century
defended on the front-foot to offside
short of length ball on the off stump, pushed to extra-cover
turned away through mid-wicket
slower one outside off stump, Tharanga looks to run down to thirdman and gets beaten
good length ball on the leg stump, defended on the front-foot to onside
short ball banged in on the middle stump, coming in with the angle, Jayasuriya makes room and tries to cut but misses
fuller length ball outside off stump, Jayasuriya smashes on the front-foot over the cover fielder
defended on the front-foot to mid-on
short ball on the leg stump, pulled away to deep backward square leg
slower one on the middle and leg stump line, Tharanga hits it away to long-on region, not a well-timed shot to take the ball to fence
fuller length ball on the leg stump, Jayasuriya flicks it away high and over mid-wicket fence, Jayasuriya's trademark shot!
pushed on the front-foot to mid-off and Tharanga moves onto 98
length ball on the off stump, Jayasuriya charges down the track and swings across the line, ball takes off the outside edge and flies over the short-thirdman fielder
Four more! this time Jayasuriya hits it right on the middle of the bat by charging down again, one bounce into the mid-wicket fence
on the pads, flicked away to mid-wicket for a couple of runs
pitched up on the off stump, pushed to mid-off
short ball around the off stump, Jayasuriya pulls it away handsomely to the mid-wicket fence, this game is going straight into the history books!
bouncer high over the batsman, Jayasuriya ducks and Umpire calls it a wide
short ball outside off stump, cut away in the air to deep point for a couple of runs
Max! short ball on the middle stump, Jayasuriya picks it up, rocks back and pulls it high over the square leg fence, just the usual!
Four more! length ball outside off stump, Jayasuriya just moves forward and smashes it at one bounce into the cover fence
defended on the front-foot to offside
off the pads to onside
defended on the front-foot to cover
good length ball on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
driven on the front-foot to cover fielder
fraction short on the off stump, cut away to point fielder
flighted and full ball, driven to long-on and thats a good over from Darlymple
pushed on the back-foot to point
short ball on the leg stump, glanced away to deep mid-wickef
short of length ball outside off stump, cut away to thirdman
length ball outside off stump, driven on the front-foot to sweeper cover
Smashing shot! length ball outside off stump, Jayasuriya charges down the track and smashes through a ring of fielders on the offside
slower one outside off stump, Jayasuriya steps out again and lofts it down to long-on, inches away from the rope
defended on the front-foot to cover
full length ball on the leg stump, swept away to deep square leg
defended on the front-foot back to the bowler
on the pads, turned away to square leg
flighted and full length ball on the leg stump, driven to long-on
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven to deep cover
fraction short outside off stump, cut away to deep point
defended on the front-foot to offside
short ball around the off stump, cut away straight to the cover fielder
flat one on the middle stump, pulled away to long-on
driven on the front-foot to deep cover and that brings up Jayasuriya's 150
pushed on the back-foot to point fielder
flighed ball on the leg stump, swept away to deep mid-wicket
short ball outside off stump, cut away to deep point
mistimed cut to the sweeper cover
full ball on the pads, flicked away wide of the deep mid-wicket fielder for a couple of runs

Atlast a wicket! flighted ball on the middle and leg stump line, Tharanga moves forward and tries to on-drive, ball takes off the leading edge and goes straight back to the bowler, end of an amazing record-breaking partnership!
down the legside
tossed up, Jayawardene down the wicket and tries to loft over mid-on fielder just facing his 2nd delivery, mistimes and goes in the air, Kabir Ali runs backwards and drops a difficult chance
pushed uppishly to the cover region, falls well short of the fielder
short delivery outside off stump, Jayasuriya rocks back and cuts it in the air to backward point, Strauss brings off a good overhead catch, one of the best one-day innings comes to an end
turned away behind square for an easy single
defended back to the bowler
on the pads, turned away to square leg
driven wide of the mid-off fielder
fuller length ball on the off stump, driven to mid-off
edged but along the ground back to the bowler
driven through cover point
flighted ball on the off stump, turned away to mid-wicket, good fielding by the fielder saves a run
fraction short on the stumps, pulled away to deep square leg
good length ball on the off stump, defended away to cover
good bouncer directed well into Jayawardene, pulled away to deep square leg
on the pads, Sangakkara glances it away nicely to fine leg
short and wide outside off stump, Jayawardene rocks back, cuts and misses, a rare sight!
good length ball just outside off stump, driven on the front-foot to mid-off fielder
short ball outside off stump, again Jayawardene misses on it trying to play the cut shot
good length ball outside off stump, left alone, just 2 runs off the over
defended on the front-foot to offside
good length ball on the off stump, defended to cover point
length ball outside off stump, Sangakkara tries to loft over cover, gets the outside edge over the slip fielder
fuller length ball outside off stump, driven to the cover region, half-stop and they take a couple of runs
defended back to the bowler
fuller length ball on the off stump, Sangakkara drives and mistimes back to the bowler
driven on the up through covers and an easy single taken
bouncer high and over the batsman, called a wide
short ball banged in, Sangkkara pulls and gets the top edge, ball falls short of the deep square leg fielder
good length ball outside off stump, Jayawardene pushes on the front-foot, gets the outside edge to thirdman fence
driven through covers and an easy single taken
half-volley on the off stump, Sangakkara drives beautifully through covers and ball races away to the fence
pitched up on the off stump, Sangakkara drives to mid-off, Plunkett lets it go through his legs and ball reaches the fence
again a drive to mid-off, this time Plunkett fields and cheers from the crowd as he fields the ball
turning into the leg stump, turned away to deep mid-wicket
driven on the front-foot to cover fielder
short ball on the off stump, Sangakkara rocks back and punches to the cover fence, that brings up the victory and they have done it in style
